name: Informed consent
text:
(a)  Before any nonemergency treatment for mental illness can commence, informed consent, as required by section 671-3 and as defined by the board of medical examiners pursuant to the authority vested in it by that section, shall be obtained from the patient, or the patients guardian, if the patient is not competent to give informed consent.
	(b)  A signed consent form reflecting the proceeding shall be obtained and maintained as part of the patients record. [L 1980, c 272, pt of §1]
